Race.SpecificTitle: Alderman -- District D, Town of Krotz Springs
PW School District -- Local Option - Term Limits
Race.FullText:
"LOCAL OPTION ELECTION
Within St. Landry Parish School District:
Shall the number of terms of office that any member of the school board may serve be limited to three consecutive four-year terms?"

Race.SpecificTitle: PW Parish Council -- 2.17 Mills - PC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Parishwide Proposition
(Tax Renewal)

Summary:  10 year, 2.17 mills property tax renewal for maintaining and operating public health units in the Parish.
Race.FullText: Shall the Parish of St. Landry, State of Louisiana (the "Parish"), continue to levy a two and seventeen hundredths (2.17) mills tax on all the property subject to taxation within the Parish (an estimated $474,650 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2014 and ending with the year 2023, for the purpose of maintaining and operating public health units in the Parish?

Race.SpecificTitle: Sub-Rd Dist#1 of Rd Dist 11A -- 9.56 Mills - PC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Sub-Road District No. 1 of Road District 11A Proposition 
(Tax Renewal)

Summary:  10 year, 9.56 mills property tax renewal for improving, maintaining and operating public roads and bridges within the District, including the purchase of equipment therefor.
Race.FullText: Shall Sub-Road District No. 1 of Road District 11A of the Parish of St. Landry, State of Louisiana (the "District"), continue to levy a nine and fifty-six hundredths (9.56) mills tax on all the property subject to taxation within the District (an estimated $191,060 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2013 and ending with the year 2022, for the purpose of improving, maintaining and operating public roads and bridges within the District, including the purchase of equipment therefor?

Race.SummaryText:
Sub-Road District No. 1 of Road District 3 of Ward 1 Proposition
(Tax Renewal)

Summary:  10 year, 9.57 mills property tax renewal for improving, maintaining and operating public roads and bridges within the District, including the purchase of equipment therefor.
Race.FullText: Shall Sub-Road District No. 1 of Road District 3 of Ward 1 of the Parish of St. Landry, State of Louisiana (the "District"), continue to levy a nine and fifty-seven hundredths (9.57) mills tax on all the property subject to taxation within the District (an estimated $47,400 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2014 and ending with the year 2023, for the purpose of improving, maintaining and operating public roads and bridges within the District, including the purchase of equipment therefor?

Race.SpecificTitle: Sub-Rd Dist#2 of Rd Dist 11A -- 8.39 Mills - PC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Sub-Road District No. 2 of Road District 11A Proposition
(Tax Renewal)

Summary:  10 year, 8.39 mills property tax renewal for improving, maintaining and operating public roads and bridges within the District, including the purchase of equipment therefor.
Race.FullText: Shall Sub-Road District No. 2 of Road District 11A of the Parish of St. Landry, State of Louisiana (the "District"), continue to levy an eight and thirty-nine hundredths (8.39) mills tax on all the property subject to taxation within the District (an estimated $142,450 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2013 and ending with the year 2022, for the purpose of improving, maintaining and operating public roads and bridges within the District, including the purchase of equipment therefor?

Race.SummaryText:
Coulee Croche Gravity Drainage District No. 22 Propositions
Proposition No. 1
(Millage Renewal)

Summary:  10 year, 4.72 mills property tax renewal for constructing, improving, and maintaining gravity drainage works within and for the District.
Race.FullText: Shall Coulee Croche Gravity Drainage District No. 22 of St. Landry Parish, Louisiana (the "District"), continue to levy a special tax of four and seventy-two hundredths (4.72) mills on all property subject to taxation within the District (an estimated $36,430 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2014 and ending with the year 2023, for the purpose of constructing, improving, and maintaining gravity drainage works within and for the District?

Race.SummaryText:
Coulee Croche Gravity Drainage District No. 22 Propositions
Proposition No. 2
(Millage Renewal)

Summary:  10 year, 4.50 mills property tax renewal for constructing, improving, and maintaining gravity drainage works within and for the District.
Race.FullText: Shall Coulee Croche Gravity Drainage District No. 22 of St. Landry Parish, Louisiana (the "District"), continue to levy a special tax of four and fifty hundredths (4.50) mills on all property subject to taxation within the District (an estimated $34,730 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2013 and ending with the year 2022, for the purpose of constructing, improving, and maintaining gravity drainage works within and for the District?
